content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.recontrack') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.recontrack
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.recontrack (
[v1ID] int,
[v1OpenDt] datetime2(7),
[v1CloseDt] datetime2(7),
[v1LoadID] int,
[v1UserID] int,
[v1ParcelID] int,
[v1tolocid] int,
[v1touserid] int,
[v1fromlocid] int,
[v1TrackTypeID2] int,
[v1TrackTypeID] int,
[v1LastUpdate] datetime2(7),
[v1ToLoadid] int,
[v1OpenStationID] int,
[v1CloseStationID] int,
[v2id] bigint,
[v2parcelid] bigint,
[v2manifestid] bigint,
[v2entity] nvarchar(4000),
[v2eid] bigint,
[v2trackdate] bigint,
[v2parcelstatusid] bigint,
[v2parcelstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2tracktype] nvarchar(4000),
[v2description] nvarchar(4000),
[v2insdate] bigint,
[v2moddate] bigint,
[v2insby] bigint,
[v2legacyid] bigint,
[v2migrationstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2legacytype] nvarchar(4000),
[v2locname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2locid] bigint,
[v2bayid] bigint,
[v2bay] nvarchar(4000),
[v2movementid] bigint,
[v2tracktypeid] bigint,
[v2movementtypeid] bigint,
[notinv2] int,



	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/LMSV2/recontrack.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.recontrack 
GO
